definition: confession/to make clear one's position or intentions/to brag

white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: "Confessions of a Shopaholic "was fifth for the weekend.
sentences.chinese: 《一个购物狂的自白》排名第五。

sentences.english: He closed his eyes, lost in his agonized confession.
sentences.chinese: 他闭上眼睛，沉浸在自己痛苦的自白中。
阿加西的自白对网球运动是个伤害吗？

sentences.english: The second chapter is about the rhetoric of the confession.
sentences.chinese: 第二章是关于自白书的修辞。

sentences.english: He could not help feeling infinite pity for the painter who had just made this strange confession to him.
sentences.chinese: 他不由得无限同情这个才作了一番奇特自白的画家。

sentences.english: Palmer turned over the confession tape to the authorities.
sentences.chinese: 帕默已经将那盘自白录音带交给了当局。

sentences.english: He claims that police forced him to sign a confession.
sentences.chinese: 他声称警方强迫他签下自白书。

sentences.english: She later recanted that confession and has denied wrongdoing.
sentences.chinese: 她之后撤回认罪自白并否认有任何行为不当。

sentences.english: Complaints and buck-passing are the confession of cowardice.
sentences.chinese: 抱怨和推诿，其实是懦弱的自白。

sentences.english: Do you stay for her confessions of love, because you don't want to hurt her?
sentences.chinese: 因为你不想伤害她，你留下了等她的爱情自白吗？

sentences.english: Being the most talented Confessional Poet of America, Sylvia Plath takes poem as the way of releasing her emotion.
sentences.chinese: 普拉斯被誉为美国“自白派最富有才情的诗人”。

definition: to recount in one's own words/autobiography/written self-introduction
to talk from one's personal experience/to use oneself as an example
young person who adopts an artistic or intellectual style/abbr. for 文藝青年|文艺青年
to accuse/to denounce/to make a complaint against/denunciation
start of literary work/opening song of ballad in Tanci style 彈詞|弹词[tan2 ci2]
words written on one’s deathbed/an artist's final work/swansong
words from the bottom of one's heart
